resources.string: If you remove %1$s, that user will no longer be able to access this site, but any content that was created by %1$s will remain on the site.\n\nWould you still like to remove this user?
The sites in this list haven\'t posted anything recently

New! Tap your Gravatar to change it!
Currently unavailable. Please enter your password
Get a link sent to your email to sign in instantly
The Jetpack plugin is installed, but not connected to WordPress.com. Do you want to connect Jetpack?
Visual editor is not compatible with your device. It was\n automatically disabled.
You now have unlimited access to Premium themes. Preview any theme on your site to get started.
You can upload and host videos on your site with VideoPress and your expanded media storage.
Bring posts to life with video
You now have access to custom fonts, custom colours, and custom CSS editing capabilities.
Your site is doing somersaults in excitement! Now explore your site\'s new features and choose where you\'d like to begin.
It\'s all yours, way to go!
Your posts, pages, and settings will be emailed to you at %s.
You have active premium upgrades on your site. Please cancel your upgrades prior to deleting your site.
Something went wrong. Could not request purchases.
This action cannot be undone. Deleting your site will remove all content, contributors, and domains from the site.
Export your site to an XML file
If you are sure, please be sure to take the time and export your content now. It cannot be recovered in the future.
The domains that will not work once you remove your site
Be careful! Deleting your site will also remove your domain(s) listed below.
There was an error in deleting your site. Please contact support for more assistance
Please type %1$s in the field below to confirm. Your site will then be gone forever.

If you want a site but don\'t want any of the posts and pages you have now, our support team can delete your posts, pages, media and comments for you.\n\nThis will keep your site and URL active, but give you a fresh start on your content creation. Just contact us to have your current content cleared out.
Some media uploads have failed. You can\'t save or publish\n your post in this state. Would you like to remove all failed media?
Couldn\'t connect to the WordPress site due to Timeout error.
Couldn\'t connect. The WordPress installation responded with an invalid XML-RPC document.
Couldn\'t connect. Required XML-RPC methods are missing on the server.
Information on WordPress.com courses and events (online & in-person).
Opportunities to participate in WordPress.com research & surveys.
Tips for getting the most out of WordPress.com.

Require approval for more than 1 link
Require approval for more than 0 links

Comments couldn\'t be refreshed at this time - showing older comments
The WordPress app for Android now includes a beautiful new visual\n editor. Try it out by creating a new post.
Add the widget to your home screen to access your Stats in one click.
Allow comments to be nested in threads.
Your site is visible only to you and users you approve
Your site is visible to everyone but asks search engines not to index it
Your site is visible to everyone and may be indexed by search engines

Discourage search engines from indexing this site
I would like my site to be private, visible only to users I choose
A connection error occurred while uploading media
Require approval for comments that include more than this number of links.
Break comment threads into multiple pages.
When a comment contains any of these words in its content, name, URL, email, or IP, it will be marked as spam. You can enter partial words, so "press" will match "WordPress."
When a comment contains any of these words in its content, name, URL, email, or IP, it will be held in the moderation queue. You can enter partial words, so "press" will match "WordPress."
You can override these settings for individual posts.
The WordPress for Android App Gets a Big Facelift
Related Posts displays relevant content from your site below your posts.
Removes your site data from the app
Comments that match a filter are marked as spam
Comments that match a filter are put in the moderation queue
Ignores link limit from known users
Comment author must have a previously approved comment
Users must be registered and logged in to comment
Comment author must fill out name and e-mail
Display comments in chunks of a specified size
Allow nested comments to a certain depth
Determines the order comments are displayed
Disallow comments after the specified time

Show or hide related posts in reader

Disconnecting your account will remove all of @%s’s WordPress.com data from this device, including local drafts and local changes.

Enter the code from your authenticator app.
Check your text messages for the verification code.
Sign in to your WordPress.com account to connect to Jetpack.
Learn more about your search traffic by looking at the terms your visitors searched for to find your site.

Keep track of your overall number of followers, and how long each one has been following your site.
Keep track of your followers from various social networking services using publicise.
If you\'ve uploaded videos using VideoPress, find out how many times they’ve been watched.
If you allow comments on your site, track your top commenters and discover what content sparks the liveliest conversations, based on the most recent 1,000 comments.
Get an overview of the most popular topics on your site, as reflected in your top posts from the past week.
Track the views on each contributor\'s posts, and zoom in to discover the most popular content by each author.
No tagged posts or pages viewed
When your content includes links to other sites, you’ll see which ones your visitors click on the most.
Learn more about your site’s visibility by looking at the websites and search engines that send the most traffic your way
Discover what your most-viewed content is, and check how individual posts and pages perform over time.
Explore the list to see which countries and regions generate the most traffic to your site.
You\'re not following any sites yet

Username must be longer than 4 characters

Username can only contain lowercase letters (a-z) and numbers

Username may not contain the character “_”
Username must have a least 1 letter (a-z)

Site address can only contain lowercase letters (a-z) and numbers

An error occurred while creating the app database. Try reinstalling the app.
The Jetpack plugin is required for stats. Contact the site administrator.
You can\'t use that email address to signup. We are having problems with them blocking some of our email. Use another email provider.
That email address has already been used. Check your inbox for an activation email. If you don\'t activate you can try again in a few days.
Site address must have at least 1 letter (a-z)
Something went wrong while refreshing the media library. Try again later.
You can\'t share to WordPress without a visible blog
You and one other like this
But don\'t worry, just tap the icon at the top right to start exploring!
This account has two step authentication enabled. Visit your security settings on WordPress.com and generate an application-specific password.
You need a more secure password. Make sure to use 7 or more characters, mix uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers or special characters.
The Jetpack plugin is required for stats. Do you want to install Jetpack?
Limit reached. You can try again in 1 minute. Trying again before that will only increase the time you have to wait before the ban is lifted. If you think this is in error, contact support.
